name: hugo-delivery
description: Build websites with Hugo and Parcel

scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others "parcel watch src/base.scss src/index.js --out-dir site/static/bundled/" "hugo server --source site --watch --destination ../dist"
scripts.build: parcel build src/base.scss src/index.js --out-dir site/static/bundled/ && hugo --source site --destination ../public
